title.rendered: Developing Partnership to Provide Managed Endpoint Detection and Response (M-EDR)

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1652041367110{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]London, 9 May 2022 – ESET, Grove and Falanx Cyber are pleased to announce that they are working together to promote Managed-Endpoint Detection and Response (M-EDR) solutions and services to customers across the region.

The ESET EDR capability is a leader in its field providing customers with protection from advanced persistent threats. The cloud-based version is now available enabling customers in the hybrid network environment to have full protection and control.

Additional value to the solution is gained from having it “managed and monitored 24×7”. This involves having “eyes-on-glass” to delve into the areas that are highlighted as requiring further investigation. Falanx Cyber have the infrastructure and expertise to ensure that the EDR is “managed” effectively.

Grove have deep experience of helping organisations bring products to market at all stages of their development cycle.

EDR is a growing market and M-EDR is a crucial component to combat the threats posed as organisations evolve, the way they work changes, and the threats become more sophisticated. Together ESET, Falanx Cyber and Grove have the software, solutions, tools, and people to drive further adoption of an M-EDR solution.

The service has been live for some time and will be formally “launched” at CYBERUK 2022. The National Cyber Security Centre is proud to present CYBERUK 2022, the UK Government’s flagship cyber security event, in ICC Wales, Newport on 10-11 May 2022.

Rick Flood, Managing Director Falanx Cyber, commented on the partnership:

“We are excited to be partnering with ESET. We have been looking for a partnership with a vendor who is steeped in security and ESET is exactly that. They fully understand the need for a SOC service behind their EDR and we are proud that they have chosen us.”

 

About ESET

For more than 30 years, ESET® has been developing industry-leading IT security software and services to protect businesses, critical infrastructure and consumers worldwide from increasingly sophisticated digital threats. From endpoint and mobile security to endpoint detection and response, as well as encryption and multifactor authentication, ESET’s high-performing, easy-to-use solutions unobtrusively protect and monitor 24/7, updating defences in real time to keep users safe and businesses running without interruption. Evolving threats require an evolving IT security company that enables the safe use of technology. This is backed by ESET’s R&D centres worldwide, working in support of our shared future. www.eset.co.uk

About Grove

Grove is a Cyber Security led technology business serving over 2,500 customers globally. We partner with leaders in their field to deliver services to customers that enable them to Monitor, Detect and Respond to threats that their people, systems and networks are exposed to. Deloitte has acknowledged us on three occasions as one of the fastest growing technology companies in the United Kingdom, as well as Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA). www.groveis.com

About Falanx Cyber:

Falanx Cyber puts enterprise-class cyber security services within reach of every organisation. We identify areas of cyber risk threatening the integrity of your business and provide complete end-to-end managed cyber security services to alleviate those risks. Combining managed detection and response (MDR) services with penetration testing, incident response and consultancy. It is a publicly listed business traded on the AIM stock exchange. Falanx Cyber operates from the UK with its headquarters and Security Operations Centre (SOC) based in Reading.
Falanxcyber.com

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
